    "ProxyGroupId": "cynosdbmysql-node-asd",
    "ReloadBalance": "auto",
    "IsInMaintainPeriod": "no",
    "ProxyZones": [
        {
            "ProxyNodeZone": "ap-guangzhou-3",
            "ProxyNodeCount": 2
        }
    ]
}
